art payg
feel free to use this in your projects credit is appreciated

++++ Operational security posters
-----

[[collapsible show="'Stay on target'" hide="Hide poster"]]
[[image https://imgur.com/DSj8Qx8.png]]
[[/collapsible]]
[[collapsible show="'If you talk they will listen'" hide="Hide poster"]]

++++ Logos

-----
[[collapsible show="The five eyes initiative logo" hide="Hide FIYVE logo"]]
[[=image https://imgur.com/9PF7uKb.png width="400px" align="centre"]]

Made for a secretive organization on a SCP RP Gmod server that "ensured the order and stability of the site". [[span class="bblock"]]EVES FIYLE SIGIL[[/span]].
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="MTF Rho-5 logo" hide="Hide MTF Rho-5 logo"]]
[[=image https://imgur.com/SeBXi1o.png width="400px" align="centre"]]

Made for an MTF on a SCP RP Gmod server, that deals with existential threats. Dragon/serpent inspired by sunnyclockworks. Taking nick name suggestions for the MTF.
[[/collapsible]]


++++ MTF Posters

-----

[[collapsible show="MTF Pi-1 Poster" hide="Hide poster"]]
[[image https://imgur.com/0g2pogz.png]]

Made for a gmod SCP-RP server poster competition. On the server Pi-1 serves a slightly different purpose of defending against GOI raids (like CI) and recontainment.
[[/collapsible]]

++++ GOI Posters

-----

author: Lenny the burger
